## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3bfba6b9e0fd94482259da8ea62eb7487f6b9b1566c41f08c8bc5880b1e92983)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'hllm' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
